name: Good Morning Is A Social Construct
name_original: Good Morning Is A Social Construct
description:
follow 15 year old miya nakamina though high school, where she finds herself increasingly lost and alien. her only friend is growing up past her own pace, where does that leave miya in the world? completely alone forever, probably...

two week project submitted to vn cup

features
  • full heart chibi art
  • high school grammar and typos
  • yuri(?)
  • it looks like it should have come out in 2003
  • bgm by soapdrip, nicetone & pebble

it should take you about an hour to complete the whole story
